job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtThis is your dream position if you love providing actionable insights from sources like media buying platforms and customer journeys through the ecommerce cycleltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtTHIS IS POSITION FOR OUR OFFICE IN SALT LAKE CITY UTAHltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAnalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingltligtltligtCollaborate with the media buyer team to bring analytical insights to the realityltligtltligtGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or equivalent experience in a quantitative field Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Engineering information systemsltligtltligtAt least 1  2 years of experience in analyticsltligtltligtExperience in gathering insights from google ads manager Facebook Shopify Gemini Acuity taboola etcltligtltulgt
